column4: when I attempt to do "sudo regedit" I get this: "wine: /home/titan/.wine is not owned by you" How do I take ownership of the .wine folder and all files underneath?
the .wine stuff is owned by the user.. and  thus he can regedit his own wine things.
now you MIGHT of just messed that up if you accessed some files as root. they may now be owned by root - not theuser any more
